item.title: 中国 3 月出口可能在特朗普新关税生效前获得前置性提升
item.description: 尽管与美国不断扩大的贸易战令经济前景暗淡，但由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）本月将全面征收关税，中国的工厂赶在关税之前发货，因此 3 月份中国的出口可能加快了步伐。【原文：China's exports likely picked up pace in March, as factories rushed out shipments ahead of U.S. President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs this month, though the broadening trade war with the United States has darkened the economic outlook.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，申银万国伦敦上市获英国批准，正等待中国点头
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，在线快速时尚零售商 Shein 已获得英国金融行为监管局（FCA）的批准，计划在伦敦进行首次公开募股。【原文：Online fast-fashion retailer Shein has secured approval from Britain's Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) for its planned initial public offering in London, according to two sources with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Stellantis 第一季度出货量同比下降 9
item.description: Stellantis 周五表示，其第一季度的出货量与去年同期相比下降了 9%，估计为 120 万辆。【原文：Stellantis said on Friday its first-quarter shipments were down 9% compared to last year, to an estimated 1.2 million vehicles.】

item.title: 独家报道虚假账户为杜特尔特点赞，现在又瞄准菲律宾大选
item.description: 菲律宾前总统罗德里戈-杜特尔特（Rodrigo Duterte）因血腥的毒品战争被送往国际刑事法院接受指控后，一个复杂的虚假社交媒体账户网络慷慨激昂地为他辩护。【原文：A sophisticated network of fake social media accounts sprang to the impassioned defence of former Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte after he was sent to the International Criminal Court to face charges over his bloody drug war.】

item.title: 法国总统马克龙：特朗普暂停加征关税只是 "脆弱的暂停
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）周五表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）本周决定暂停对各国征收关税90天，这只为 "脆弱的暂停 "提供了空间。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron said on Friday that U.S. President Donald Trump's decision this week for a 90-day suspension on tariffs he had imposed on countries gave room for only a 'fragile pause'.】

item.title: 市场持续波动，投资者正努力应对关税带来的经济威胁
item.description: 周四，希望结束市场剧烈波动的投资者意识到，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普不断变化的关税计划所带来的后果仍对盈利和经济构成威胁，并可能对股市造成更多惩罚。【原文：Investors hoping for an end to wild market swings were reminded on Thursday that fallout from U.S. President Donald Trump's shifting tariff plans remains a threat to earnings and the economy, and could deal yet more punishment to equities.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税混乱可能导致飞机交付陷入困境
item.description: 在过去几个月里，由于白宫时好时坏的关税政策，汽车、消费品和工业设备时常在港口延误、滞留在铁路车辆上、在仓库里徘徊。【原文：Cars, consumer goods, and industrial equipment have been delayed at ports, stuck on rail cars, and languished in warehouses at times over the last few months due to the White House's on-again, off-again tariff policy.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，谷歌在安卓和 Pixel 集团裁员数百人
item.description: 据 The Information 周五援引一位知情人士的话报道，Alphabet 旗下的谷歌周四裁掉了平台和设备部门的数百名员工，该部门主要负责安卓软件、Pixel 手机和 Chrome 浏览器。【原文：Alphabet's Google on Thursday laid off hundreds of employees in its platforms and devices unit, which works on Android software, Pixel phones and the Chrome browser, The Information reported on Friday, citing a person with direct knowledge of the situation.】

item.title: 早间竞价市场重回白刃战
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 随着 90 天窗口期的开启，欧盟就如何应对美国关税集思广益
item.description: 由于美国将提高关税的时间推迟了 90 天，欧盟各国财长将在周五集思广益，商讨如何利用这段时间与华盛顿达成贸易协议，以及在无法达成贸易协议的情况下如何协调各方努力以应对更高的关税。【原文：With higher U.S. tariffs postponed by 90 days, European Union finance ministers will brainstorm on Friday how to use that time to get a trade deal with Washington and how to coordinate their efforts to handle higher tariffs if they do not.】

item.title: 特斯拉暂停在中国网站接受 Model S 和 Model X 的新订单
item.description: 根据路透社周五的核查，特斯拉已暂停在其中国网站上接受 Model S 和 Model X 汽车的新订单。【原文：Tesla has suspended taking new orders for Model S and Model X vehicles on its Chinese website, according to checks made by Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 经济衰退风险挥之不去，特朗普暂停加征关税缓解效果甚微
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策引发的一周动荡在周五几乎没有缓解的迹象，市场再次暴跌，外国领导人正试图找出如何应对世界贸易秩序瓦解的办法。【原文：A week of turmoil unleashed by U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs showed little sign of easing on Friday, with markets again tumbling and foreign leaders trying to work out how to respond to a dismantling of the world trade order.】

item.title: 独家报道面对特朗普关税，越南着眼于打击部分对华贸易
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士和路透社看到的一份政府文件称，为了避免美国的惩罚性关税，越南准备打击经由其领土运往美国的中国商品，并将加强对敏感的对华出口产品的控制。【原文：In hope of avoiding punishing U.S. tariffs, Vietnam is prepared to crack down on Chinese goods being shipped to the United States via its territory and will tighten controls on sensitive exports to China, according to a person familiar with the matter and a government document seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 美元下滑，避险资金流入，黄金突破 3,200 美元
item.description: 受美元走软和贸易战升级的推动，投资者纷纷涌向避险资产，黄金在上周五首次突破3200美元/盎司的关键水平，创下新高。【原文：Gold breached the key $3,200/oz level for the first time to scale a new peak on Friday, fuelled by a weaker dollar and an escalating trade war that sent investors rushing toward safe-haven assets.】

item.title: 贸易战搅动市场，股市、美元下挫，债券再遭重创
item.description: 这种焦虑引发了对避风港的抢购，使得瑞士法郎兑美元汇率飙升至十年来的新高，黄金也达到了新的峰值。【原文：The anxiety has sparked a rush into safe havens, sending the Swiss franc soaring to a decade high against the dollar, and gold to a new peak.】

item.title: 特斯拉在美国推出全新 Cybertruck 车型，售价 69,990 美元
item.description: 特斯拉周四表示，已在美国推出新版 Cybertruck，售价为 69,990 美元。【原文：Tesla on Thursday said it has launched a new version of Cybertruck in the United States, priced at $69,990.】

item.title: 中日韩央行代表讨论美国关税问题
item.description: 中国央行周五表示，中日韩财政和央行官员举行了会晤，讨论了美国关税对全球和地区宏观经济形势的影响。【原文：China, Japan and South Korea finance and central bank officials met and discussed the impact of U.S. tariffs on the global and regional macroeconomic situation, China's central bank said on Friday.】

item.title: 中美贸易战导致需求减少，油价将连续第二周下跌
item.description: 由于担心世界最大经济体美国和中国之间旷日持久的贸易战会抑制经济增长，从而压制原油消费，周五油价下跌，并将连续第二周下跌。【原文：Oil prices fell on Friday and were set to drop for a second week on concerns prolonged trade war between the United States and China, the world's largest economies, will crush crude consumption as their dispute curtails economic growth.】

item.title: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司发行总额 6.27 亿美元的日元债券
item.description: 根据路透社查阅的一份条款书，沃伦-巴菲特的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）已定价发行总额为 900 亿日元（约合 6.267 亿美元）的 6 期日元债券。【原文：Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway has priced a 6-tranche yen denominated bond totalling 90 billion yen ($626.70 million), according to a term sheet reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 美元兑瑞郎跌至十年低点，美国资产受信心缺失打击
item.description: 由于对美国经济的信心减弱，促使投资者抛弃美国资产，转而青睐瑞士法郎、日元、欧元和黄金等避险资产，美元周五大幅下挫。【原文：The dollar slumped on Friday as waning confidence in the U.S. economy prompted investors to ditch U.S. assets to the benefit of safe havens such as the Swiss franc, yen and euro, as well as gold.】

item.title: 五角大楼将终止与埃森哲、德勤等公司价值 51 亿美元的 IT 合同
item.description: 周四的一份备忘录显示，美国国防部长皮特-黑格塞斯（Pete Hegseth）已下令终止与埃森哲（Accenture）和德勤（Deloitte）等公司总价值达 51 亿美元的 IT 服务合同。【原文：U.S. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth has ordered the termination of IT services contracts, totally valued at $5.1 billion, with companies such as Accenture and Deloitte, a memo showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普签署法案，废除美国国税局扩大后的加密货币经纪人规则
item.description: 据白宫发表的一份声明称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四签署了一项法案，以推翻美国国内税收署（Internal Revenue Service）修订后的规则，该规则扩大了经纪人的定义，将去中心化的加密货币交易所包括在内。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Thursday signed into law a bill to overturn a revised rule from the Internal Revenue Service that expanded the definition of a broker to include decentralized cryptocurrency exchanges, according to a statement from the White House.】

item.title: 连锁酒店凯悦押注印度人口激增推动增长
item.description: 凯悦酒店集团（Hyatt Hotels）的一位高管表示，该集团正寄希望于印度不断增长的人口和消费者消费能力，以帮助这家美国连锁酒店集团在本财年在亚洲国家保持两位数的收入增长。【原文：Hyatt Hotels is betting on India's rising population and consumer spending power to help the U.S. hotel chain keep up revenue growth in the double-digit percentage range in the Asian country this financial year, an executive said.】

item.title: 华尔街大幅下挫，日本日经指数下跌 5
item.description: 周五早盘，日本日经平均股价暴跌 5%，追随华尔街的大幅下挫，原因是人们担心贸易战可能带来的经济后果。【原文：Japan's Nikkei share average slumped 5% in early trade on Friday, tracking Wall Street's sharp losses amid worries over uncertainty about the trade war's potential economic fallout.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称委内瑞拉国家石油公司（PDVSA）暂停对雪佛龙公司的石油装载授权
item.description: 三位知情人士周四透露，委内瑞拉国家石油公司 PDVSA 已取消了对其合资伙伴雪佛龙公司（Chevron）本月装载和出口委内瑞拉石油的几项授权。【原文：Venezuela's state oil company PDVSA has canceled several authorizations it had granted to its joint venture partner, Chevron , to load and export Venezuelan oil this month, three sources with knowledge of the decision said on Thursday.】

item.title: 边疆航空公司因特朗普贸易战打击旅游业而取消预测
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易战打击了旅游需求，边疆航空公司（Frontier Airlines）的母公司边疆集团（Frontier Group）周四撤回了全年业绩预期，并警告称第一季度将出现亏损。【原文：Frontier Group , the parent of Frontier Airlines, withdrew its full-year forecast on Thursday and warned of a loss in the first quarter, as U.S. President Donald Trump's trade war has hit travel demand.】

item.title: 中国碧桂园与部分债权人达成债务重组协议
item.description: 中国房地产开发商碧桂园周五表示，已与持有其现有债券债务近 30% 的债权人达成协议，并即将与另一组银行债权人敲定条款。【原文：Chinese property developer Country Garden said on Friday it had reached an agreement with creditors holding nearly 30% of its existing bond debt and was close to finalising terms with another group of bank creditors.】

item.title: 对冲基金错失了大部分股市缓解性反弹行情
item.description: 周三，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布在90天内暂停征收部分关税，引发美股大幅反弹，全球股票多空对冲基金错过了其中的大部分机会。【原文：Global equities long/short hedge funds missed out on most of a massive rally in U.S. stocks on Wednesday triggered by U.S. President Donald Trump's announcement of a pause on some tariffs for 90 days.】

item.title: 巴拿马运河管理机构称 3 月份运量降至每天 33.7 艘船
item.description: 巴拿马运河是世界上第二繁忙的水道，根据其管理机构周四发布的公告，3 月份通过该运河的船只数量下降到平均每天 33.7 艘，当月共有 1,045 艘船只通过。【原文：The number of vessels that transited the Panama Canal, the world's second-busiest waterway, fell to an average of 33.7 per day in March for a total of 1,045 ships that month, according to a bulletin on Thursday by its administrative authority.】

item.title: 特朗普暂停加征关税前的适时期权交易引质疑
item.description: 数据显示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三在社交媒体上发布暂停征收关税的消息令美国股市反弹之前的几分钟里，一些身份不明的期权交易商下了价值数百万美元的赌注，赌市场会反弹。【原文：In the minutes before President Donald Trump's social media post on Wednesday pausing tariffs sent the U.S. stock market rallying, some unidentified options traders placed bets worth millions of dollars that the market would rebound, data shows.】
